# Assumes the current file is a unittest file # Runs with the currently-focused method as the test name
method=$(${TM_RUBY:=ruby} <<"EOF" n = ENV['TM_LINE_NUMBER'].to_i
File.open(ENV['TM_FILEPATH']) do |f| f.read.split("\n")[0...n].reverse.each do |line| if line =~ /^\s*def ([_a-z][_a-z0-9]*[\?!]?)/i print $1 break end end end EOF)
export RUBYLIB="$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/RubyMate${RUBYLIB:+:$RUBYLIB}" "${TM_RUBY:-ruby}" -- "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/RubyMate/run_script.rb" --name=$method
